email_body: Griff, Can you accomodate Dexter as we have in the past. This has been very helpful in establishing a fair index at Socal Border. Phillip Please cc me on the email with a guest password. The sooner the better as bidweek is underway. ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 01/26/2001 09:49 AM --------------------------- Dexter Steis on 01/26/2001 07:28:29 AM To: Phillip.K.Allen@enron.com cc: Subject: NGI access to eol Phillip, I was wondering if I could trouble you again for another guest id for eol. In previous months, it has helped us here at NGI when we go to set indexes. I appreciate your help on this. Dexter
